name: The Man In  The Yellow Coat

metadata.name: Blue Ice
metadata.description:
Blue Ice is the first in The Man In The Yellow Coat series.

The series is inspired by the works of the 80 y.o. Ukrainian artist Olexandr Polyak. The animation respects the artist's style, the details he provided and the ideas he expressed in a personal conversation.
The musical piece was created by a well-known Ukrainian composer and musician Andriy Pokaz especially for this work.

A part of the sale amount will go to support Olexandr Polyak and his family.
